definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: Firstly this chapter introduces the relative and absolute rights from legal principle theory of law angle.
sentences.chinese: 本章首先從法理角度介紹相對權和絕對權。

sentences.english: Privacy is an absolute right. It's an important element of citizens personal rights.
sentences.chinese: 隱私權是一項絕對權，是公民人身權的重要內容。
